Immersive by Design:

Pioneering 3D Web Experiences

My Work

Welcome to the digital canvas of Dean Yeager, a visionary artist and web innovator. I specialize in creating immersive 3D environments for the web, transforming browser experiences with real-time, interactive art. Leveraging my expertise in WebXR technologies and a passion for VR/AR, I craft unique digital realms for forward-thinking clients looking to elevate their online presence. Step into a world where art meets technology, and experience the future of web interaction.

What I do

Development: Enhanced Virtual Collaboration and Learning

Leverage the power of Mozilla Hubs to create dynamic 3D web experiences. Our platform facilitates real-time interaction for multiple users, ideal for virtual collaboration and immersive learning environments.

Art & Design: Elevating 3D Visualization

Specializing in 3D environment modeling and materials creation, we bring your concepts to life with meticulously crafted 3D objects, optimized for real-time rendering. Our services include GLB exports with advanced PBR materials, ensuring high-quality visuals. Tailor your experience with custom-designed rooms for special events, each environment crafted to deliver a unique and engaging experience.

Who I am

Studio 10b has been at the forefront of creative services for over ten years, delivering exceptional design solutions to businesses across various sectors. With my roots deeply embedded in website design, logo design, print collateral, engaging social media content, and dynamic video production, I have expanded my expertise to encompass various immersive 3D projects. Studio 10b blends creativity with strategic thinking to bring your brand's vision to life.

Reach Out to Innovate

Thank you for your interest in Studio 10b. Please email me at dean@studio10b.com to discuss your next amazing project.
